PSCT.Vegas:
Ⓢ You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT Dragon and 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your GY. 
① If this card you control would be destroyed, you can Tribute 1 other face-up "Hieratic" monster, instead.
